title: Killer Governors, Helping Poor People WORKS! 3.4.21
itunes:title: Killer Governors, Helping Poor People WORKS! 3.4.21
description:
On episode 824, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Chris Crofton to discuss the Texas governor lifting mask mandates and more, Stockton's basic-income experiment, Biden's announcement about coronavirus vaccines, Dr. Seuss canceling themselves, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Texas governor lifts mask mandate and allows businesses to open at 100% capacity, despite health officials' warnings
  2. Texas Coronavirus Map and Case Count
  3. Stockton’s Basic-Income Experiment Pays Off
  4. The Fall of Michael Tubbs
  5. Coronavirus: Vaccination
  6. 6 Dr. Seuss books won’t be published for racist images
  7. Chris Crofton Patreon
  8. WATCH: Headlines - DJ Premier (feat. Westside Gunn, Conway & Benny)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
